name: FlappyThree
description:
FlappyThree is a fan-made Flappy Bird (but controlled with your voice) 

"好耶" to start the game. For those who wonder, "好耶“ means “Yeah～” in Chinese

This is the first game. There will be more...

Game Creator: RequieMa (or 爱搞事的麦子 in Bilibili)

Game Resources (and idea origin): 三宝iu in Bilibili 

Game Resource Editor: 雪启凌涌 in Bilibili
